title: I Became Distrustful of Women Because I Was Dumped by My Senpai - Novel Updates

description:
“I’ll be waiting for you there first.”

With that said, the senpai went to the high school first.

I studied hard to get into the same high school as my senpai, and we got into the same high school.

I confessed to my senpai once again and..>
